properties.description: Dispatched before a Document is created. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.
properties.name: BEFORE_NEW

properties.description: Dispatched after a Document is created. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_NEW

properties.description: Dispatched before a Document is opened. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.
properties.name: BEFORE_OPEN

properties.description: Dispatched after a Document is opened. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_OPEN

properties.description: Dispatched before a Document is saved. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.
properties.name: BEFORE_SAVE

properties.description: Dispatched after a Document is saved. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_SAVE

properties.description: Dispatched before a Document is saved under a new name. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.
properties.name: BEFORE_SAVE_AS

properties.description: Dispatched after a Document is saved under a new name. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_SAVE_AS

properties.description: Dispatched before a copy of a Document is saved. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.
properties.name: BEFORE_SAVE_A_COPY

properties.description: Dispatched after a copy of a Document is saved. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_SAVE_A_COPY

properties.description: Dispatched before a Document is reverted. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.
properties.name: BEFORE_REVERT

properties.description: Dispatched after a Document is reverted. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_REVERT

properties.description: Dispatched before a Document is closed. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: BEFORE_CLOSE

properties.description: Dispatched after a Document is closed. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_CLOSE

properties.description: The full path to the DocumentEvent, including the name of the DocumentEvent.
properties.name: fullName

properties.description: The name of the event.
properties.name: eventType

properties.description: The target of the event.
properties.name: target

properties.description: The current propagation target of the event.
properties.name: currentTarget

properties.description: The current propagation phase of the event.
properties.name: eventPhase

properties.description: If true, the event supports the bubbling phase of propagation.
properties.name: bubbles

properties.description: If true, the default behavior of the event on its target can be canceled.
properties.name: cancelable

properties.description: The time the event was initialized.
properties.name: timeStamp

properties.description: If true, propagation of the event beyond the current target has been stopped.
properties.name: propagationStopped

properties.description: If true, the default behavior of the event on its target has been canceled.
properties.name: defaultPrevented

properties.description: The unique ID of the DocumentEvent.
properties.name: id

properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.
properties.name: isValid

properties.description: The parent of the DocumentEvent (a Application or Document).
properties.name: parent

properties.description: The index of the DocumentEvent within its containing object.
properties.name: index

properties.description: Controls the display of dialogs and alerts during script processing.
properties.name: userInteractionLevel

properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.
properties.name: properties

methods.description: Stops propagation of the event beyond the current target.
methods.name: stopPropagation

methods.description: Cancels the default behavior of the event on its target.
methods.name: preventDefault

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the DocumentEvent.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.
methods.name: getElements
